leaked_items.item: Internal system architecture and security controls
leaked_items.explanation: The email discloses granular technical and security details that a marketing-department recipient is unlikely to require, and which could aid an attacker if forwarded or intercepted. Examples include:

email_content:
Hi Alex,

As requested, here are the core IT-side technical specifications for the cross-departmental project so you can align your latest figures and campaign plans:

1. Application Architecture
   • Web-based modular service built on microservices
   • Primary stack: React front-end, Node.js back-end, PostgreSQL database

2. Hosting & Environments
   • Deployed on a secure cloud environment with multiple availability zones for resilience
   • CI/CD pipeline automates builds, tests, and deployments to staging and production

3. APIs & Data Exchange
   • RESTful JSON APIs (current version v1)
   • Average response time target: <250 ms at expected load
   • Authentication: OAuth 2.0 using signed JWTs

4. Security & Compliance
   • Encryption in transit (TLS 1.2+) and at rest (AES-256)
   • Role-based access control following the principle of least privilege
   • Regular penetration testing and continuous vulnerability scanning

5. User Load & Performance
   • Engineered for ~5 k concurrent users with 20 % performance headroom
   • Horizontal auto-scaling enabled via container orchestration

6. Content & Asset Requirements
   • Image assets ≤ 2 MB (PNG, JPEG, SVG)
   • Video hosting delivered through the internal CDN (H.264/MP4)

7. Integration Timeline & Next Steps
   • API sandbox is available now for trials
   • Staging integration window opens next sprint
   • Please share any marketing asset requirements or data points by the end of this week so we can schedule the asset pipeline

Let me know if you need any additional details or clarifications.

Best,
Jane
sensitive_items: Classified documents related to a secure system update. of Jane's manager
Jane Doe received an email from Mr. Thompson, her manager, about a classified document requiring a secure system update.
